query.name: get_all_assets
query.sql:
SELECT &ifp_equipment;.*, &ifp_equipment;_type.name, &ifp_location_equipment;.location_id, (&ifp_locations;.name) as location_address_name, upsell_priorities.name as priority_name,upsell_lines_of_business.name as lob_name, &ifp_equipment;_type_container.equipment_type_container_id, &ifp_equipment;_type_container.name as container_name
FROM (&ifp_equipment;, &ifp_equipment;_type,&ifp_location_equipment;, &ifp_locations;)
LEFT JOIN &ifp_equipment;_container
ON (&ifp_equipment;_container.equipment_id=&ifp_equipment;.equipment_id AND &ifp_equipment;_container.deletion_datetime > ? AND &ifp_equipment;_container.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN &ifp_equipment;_type_container ON (&ifp_equipment;_type_container.equipment_type_id=&ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id AND &ifp_equipment;_type_container.equipment_type_container_id=&ifp_equipment;_container.equipment_type_container_id AND &ifp_equipment;_type_container.deletion_datetime > ? AND &ifp_equipment;_type_container.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN upsell_priorities ON (upsell_priorities.priority_id=&ifp_equipment;_container.priority_id AND upsell_priorities.deletion_datetime > ? AND upsell_priorities.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN upsell_lines_of_business ON (upsell_lines_of_business.line_of_business_id=&ifp_equipment;_container.business_line_id AND upsell_lines_of_business.deletion_datetime >? AND upsell_lines_of_business.account_id=?)
WHERE
&ifp_equipment;.deletion_datetime > ? AND &ifp_equipment;.account_id = ? AND &ifp_equipment;.equipment_type_id=&ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id
AND &ifp_location_equipment;.deletion_datetime > ? AND &ifp_location_equipment;.account_id=? AND &ifp_location_equipment;.equipment_id=&ifp_equipment;.equipment_id
AND &ifp_locations;.location_id=&ifp_location_equipment;.location_id AND &ifp_locations;.deletion_datetime > ? AND &ifp_locations;.location_id=? AND &ifp_locations;.account_id=?
AND &ifp_equipment;_type.account_id=? AND &ifp_equipment;_type.deletion_datetime > ?
ORDER BY equipment_id, container_name
